analysis_results.strategy_reason: Highest market value per ton through carbon-rich soil enhancement.
analysis_results.ai_economic_advice: Given the dry weather in Pune and the significant profit difference (₹8050 selling profit vs. ₹6250 burning loss), the best option is to sell the rice straw to local biomass power plants or composting facilities.  Pune's proximity to industries and dry conditions make transportation feasible and profitable, maximizing residue value.
